description: This file implements authentication state management and actions for a Qwik-based frontend. It defines an AuthState type, creates an authentication context, and provides functions for login, registration, and logout, interacting with an API and managing tokens.

methods.name: useAuthProvider
methods.description: Provides an authentication store to child components, typically called at app root.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Consumes the AuthContext to access authentication state.

methods.name: loginAction
methods.description: Performs login API call, updates auth state, and manages token storage.

methods.name: registerAction
methods.description: Performs registration API call, updates auth state, and manages token storage.

methods.name: logoutAction
methods.description: Clears authentication state and token, effectively logging out the user.
